answers.answer: My dd is 6 almost 7. Terrified of going through another pregnancy. How life will change. How this pregnancy will change me. But I already am in love with my little alien. I was talking to my mom about it. She told me I wouldn't be able to remember life before my little one shows up, that once I see her face, I wouldn't be able to imagine life any other way. I hope she's right & 99.9% of the time she is right.BTW, I'm 12 weeks.

Yes ma'am! I'm right there with you. Im 33 wks 2 days with my 2nd baby (boy) and I have 9 year old son who will be 10 in December. It's weird being an experienced mom but it's been so long since I've had a newborn I'm a little nervous lol.

I'm not terrified of labor but my firstborn is 11 yrs old now so I definitely feel like I'm starting over. My baby girl is due to arrive in 3 days amd so far my son is being a great big brother. He helped get her room together and always gives his input when we buy things for her. Good luck other than their age differences I think our kids will be fine and so will we :)

I forgot to mention that labor is what scares me the most. I didn't have a difficult labor but kinda scary due to preeclampsia. I'm hoping to have a very different labor. Maybe one that wasn't so painful (due to the pitocin).
I'm starting over as well my oldest is 10 and my 2nd is 8 and 27 weeks and 1 day with my 3rd first boy.

I'm starting over too. My kids are 13 (14 by the time the baby comes) and 8. We can't believe we're going back to diapers and baby stuff. Crazy! I'm not scared of labor but have just started going back to school. Will be a tough balance for sure!

Mine are 9 and 5 and here we go starting all over again :-). I labored extremely easily with my first two, but this pregnancy has been full of complications. I am scheduled to go in Tuesday for an early induction and I am beyond nervous, I just hope everything goes okay for a vaginal delivery. But if not at least my doctor agreed to tie my tubes if she has to do a c-sec.
My girls are 19, 13 & 12......I KNOW I'm starting over and this is a boy! I'm due Aug 25 sometimes I feel anxious about labor, but when I look at my girls the feeling changrs

question: Im 9wks with my 2nd child, my first one is 10 yrs old and im terrified of labor !!!any one goin through the same thing?
title: starting all over again
